title: Dollarback

content: WELCOME TO DOLLARBACK, YOU GOT RUGGED BY A SCUMBAG? NOW GET YOUR SCAM BACK!_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________ Â  Â  Â   Â  WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | TWITTER Â | YOUTUBE Â | TELEGRAM Â |_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________ABOUT DOLLARBACK :You want to regain your investment lost to scams, and make a profit at the same time? Then support our project and become a part of our community, so that holding pays off for everyone again! Unfortunately, by now people fall for scams and lose their money every day. Our goal is to create an active community which increases automatically by recruiting new members on common social media platforms. The community is our most important pillar as we can push the project only together. Every single member of the community can support the project with their commitment and thereby fill the pot for our giveaway. We also plan listings on exchanges. Moreover, every team member will be available as a contact person on all social media platforms.Everyone who lost their money to a scammer can regain their investment through our giveaway. To qualify for our giveway, you have to buy and stake our token first. Then you have to verify the amount of your lost investment. Verification has to be provided via the giveaway form on our website as well as by sending the scam token onto a wallet which is set up specifically for your scam. You cannot transfer your scam token? In this case, we check the authenticity of your information and then we admit you to the giveaway. Only someone who really lost money to a scam gets the chance to win it back!DOLLARBACK FOR HOLDERTo permanently create a high volume and generate enough income for the giveaway, a tier system with staking will be set up. We expect a long-running, steadily growing rate as there is a huge number of people who fell victim to a scam. By purchasing our token, victims help other victims. Rewards are regularly distributed among holders, whereby you can increase the amount of tokens in your wallet and make a profit. This feature is turned off for staked tokens. It is meant to be a reward for our supporters. Our websiteâ€™s setup will be strongly influenced by the setup of a launchpad (buy â€“ stack â€“ participate â€“ win). Instead of winning whitelist slots, you can win the refunds of your investments with us.
